Christa Johnson

I am a front end web developer and designers that loves creating simple mobile and user friendly experiences.

About

Personal

A born and raised Georgia girl; I am a true Georgia Peach. I attended FVSU and earned a Bachelor of Arts in English. As a self-taught developer, I'm excited to continue my web developer journey.

Work

I have spent my 20s working in customer service and for the State of Georgia. Each of those positions left me with invaluable skills and experiences that can't be taught in a classroom. Now, I enjoy combining my past and current skills together to positively impact my clients.
